review: After a couple month's of using the Chromecast I can say without a doubt it's the best 35 buck's I've ever spent! Now I'll hold off on a new TV for the App's and 4K is not popular enough or cheap enough for me.. Just know this is made to works WITH a smartphone or tablet and can be used with a PC. It is not as a srandalone player if yoy want that you need Android TV or some other streaming player. It does however play the content from the router, but needs to be TOLD what to play.Example,, after starting a movie via Netflix/Hulu/YouTube you can then do whatever you need or want to on your phone/device and it will continue to play until you tell it to stop.Just trying to help those that's not sure what a Chromecast is or does.

review: This was one of the best buys I've made in literally the last five years. Even though I own Apple products (Mac, iPhone, iPad) and an Apple TV, I didn't want to buy another one to just stream Netflix onto my bedrooms TV. Don't get me wrong, the Apple TV is far better than the Chromecast but it costs three times the price (at the moment of s*** review). If you just need to stream Netflix and some other apps which are compatible with the Chromecast then it is a great option.

review: This is probably the best technology invention since the smart phone in my opinion!We currently have 3 of them in our house.We use them for Netflix, HBO Go, and more importantly Disney Jr and Disney apps.It's so simple to use even my 3 yr old know how to open  the apps and launch his shows.I also see Google is implementing features where you can control certain things with your remote which will be awesome.I'd never buy a Roku over this.
